name: Roof Runner
description:
A game for the Weekly Jam 22 with a theme: Childhood Story.

Play as the boy who gets bored when it's time to get home. It always takes 2 or 3 hours for him to be inside the car, waiting patiently. As a child with powerful imagination, he stares at the window and imagines a character running and jumping all around following the car where he is inside.

A childhood story that we used to do, we will never forget, never will. As the strong bond of feeling will last forever.

The game is focused on running, jump, take on bonuses and evading obstacle. We aim it to be a casual game.

Keyboard function:
  • Arrow button to move left and right.
  • Space button to jump.
